1.title: Food, Fads and Cancer
1.plot: Does the food you eat impact your cancer recovery? Is there such a thing as food fads? What should you eat? What should you eliminate? These questions arise in any cancer survivors life, during or post treatment. And here's the bottom line.

2.title: Ritual, Religion and Cancer
2.plot: Are survivors who become more religious or spiritual able to survive longer? Should you start going to Sunday service? These questions arise in any cancer survivor's life, during or post treatment. And here's the bottom line.

3.title: Meat, Animal Products and Cancer
3.plot: Is it true that meat is bad for cancer survivors? What about just red meat? Or how about only eating organic meat? These questions arise in any cancer survivor's life, during or post treatment. And here's the bottom line.

4.title: Lead Time Bias, Early Detection and Cancer
4.plot: Should you see a doctor if you suspect that something in your body is off? Does early detection of cancer affect survival rates? These questions arise in any cancer survivor's life, during or post treatment. And here's the bottom line.

5.title: Fear, Faith and Cancer
5.plot: Is it true that stress and anxiety can lead to a recurrence of cancer? Do survivors who have a "positive attitude" live longer? These questions arise in any cancer survivor's life, during or post treatment. And here's the bottom line.

6.title: Cancer Charities, Research and Cancer
6.plot: Does the money you give to cancer charities REALLY go toward curing cancer? How can you give money to actual cancer research? These questions arise in any cancer survivor's life, during or post treatment. And here's the bottom line.

7.title: Peace, Joy and Cancer
7.plot: Will I ever find joy in life again? Is it possible to be at peace with your diagnosis and the random curve balls life throws at you? These questions arise in any cancer survivor's life, during or post treatment. And here's the bottom line.

8.title: Death, Life After Death and Cancer
8.plot: Are you being shortchanged if you die prematurely from a cancer? Is there life after death, so maybe you don't have to fear death? These questions arise in any cancer survivor's life, during or post treatment. And here's the bottom line.

9.title: Family, Social Support and Cancer
9.plot: Should you join a support group? How important is it to reconnect with your family and friends after a cancer diagnosis? These questions arise in any cancer survivor's life, during or post treatment. And here's the bottom line.

10.title: Stress, Depression and Cancer
10.plot: Does stress cause cancer? How do you get out of depression after a cancer diagnosis? These questions arise in any cancer survivor's life, during or post treatment. And here's the bottom line.

11.title: Air, Water and Cancer
11.plot: Does the quality of the air you breathe affect cancer rates or survival? Does the quality of your water affect disease? These questions arise in any cancer survivor's life, during or post treatment. And here's the bottom line.

12.title: Prognosis, Mindset and Cancer
12.plot: Can your thoughts change your outcome? Does mindset affect a cancer prognosis? These questions arise in any cancer survivor's life, during or post treatment. And here's the bottom line.

imdb.plot outline: "Thrive! With Namrata" is a health and cancer related talk-show that focuses on diverse issues of cancer survivors such as diet, exercise, environment, faith, prayer, supplements and more. This show will feature many experts such as Dr. Debu Tripathy from M.D. Anderson Cancer Center, renowned naturopath Dr. Holly Lucille and Dr. Deanna Attai, President-Elect of the American Society of Surgeons. The show will be hosted by Indian-American actress, Namrata Singh Gujral, of Warner Bros '1 a Minute', 'Americanizing Shelley' and Bollywood's 'Kaante' who recently underwent treatments for Burkitt's Lymphoma blood cancer, the most aggressive cancer known to man, after having battled breast cancer in 2008.
imdb.title: Thrive! with Namrata
plot: "Thrive! With Namrata" is a health and cancer related talk-show that focuses on diverse issues of cancer survivors such as diet, exercise, environment, faith, prayer, supplements and more.
